portfolio.title: NetFrnds
portfolio.description: This is a responsive Social Media App using React and the Users dataâ€™s are fetched from MongoDb server. The features are Users can create an account, add a post, like the posts and we can update the friend's list.

portfolio.title: Quiz Application
portfolio.description: The Quiz Application is MERN stack application where Admin can create a quiz and the users can able attempt the quiz that is created. The key feature is user can track the progress by viewing the Scores of attempted quizzes.

portfolio.title: To-Do List Application
portfolio.description: To-Do List Application using the React which has the features like check or uncheck the tasks, add or delete the tasks. This App is helpful to remind the users day to day task and helps the user to complete the tasks on time
